Params[3]: How is it, adapting to the new environment well?
Yes, it's all good. You don't have to worry.
Not to mention, you should know exactly how I'm doing, shouldn't you?
Haha, you could say so.
But, I'd feel more relieved hearing it from you directly.
Don't worry so much about me. It'll get to me as well.
Have more faith in both yourself and me.
Right, I will.
Just, seeing you with that commandant...
Makes me a bit jealous.
If I could, I'd like to go to Earth with you too...
Don't be silly... The commandant is in constant danger of consciousness damage and death just being on a mission.
It might seem noble and exciting, but if I can...
I'd like for you to live safe and sound. Just that.
I'm all grown up now, unlike before!
I've been working hard to catch up to you...
Binary is nothing but a piece of cake to me now!
Right, right, but you still have a long way to go if you want to surpass me.
Tch, I'll get there someday!
And then I'll be the one protecting you...
All grown up, huh...
Alright then. I look forward to that day.
